title: AI Assistant
noResponse: No response yet. Ask me anything!
greeting: Hello! I'm your AI travel assistant. I'll help you plan your trip, give you insider tips, and answer all your questions. Where would you like to travel?
askAnything: Ask me anything about your trip...
tipMessage: Tip: Be as specific as possible for the best results
errorMessage: Error communicating with the AI assistant. Please try again.
destinationsPrompt: Suggest 5 destinations perfect for nature lovers and photographers.
tripPlanPrompt: Create a detailed 7-day travel plan for Lisbon focusing on culture and food.
secretTipsPrompt: What are the best local secret tips for Barcelona off the beaten path?
photoSpotsPrompt: Where can I find the best photo spots in Kyoto, especially for sunrises and sunsets?

selectProvider: Choose your preferred AI provider (Groq is free and fast!)
